post:
ErrantWeb has been providing hosting services out of Troy, MI since January of 2012, we've continued working with our customers to continue bringing out great products for you guys. We are now launching our San Diego location and in this launch we're making a amazing special. Take a look below at our 128MB plan for San Diego, it's super affordable and a great virtual server for the money!  

**For custom quotes please call:** (855) ErrantWeb x1  
or you can email us: sales@errantweb.com  

_If you order now you will lock in this price for the life of your service even if we do change the prices of the plan!_

**San Diego, CA**  

-128MB Ram  
-64MB vSwap  
-10GB Raid Storage  
-250GB Bandwidth  
-1 IPv4  
-IPv6 Available Upon Request  
Only $10/Year! - Limited Stock Available At This Price Point!  
https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=128  

-256MB Ram  
-128MB vSwap  
-15GB Raid Storage  
-500GB Bandwidth  
-1 IPv4  
-IPv6 Available Upon Request  
Only $2.25/month or $24.75/year  
https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=101
